import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {AuthentificationRequest} from '../../../services/models/authentification-request'; import {AuthentificationService} from "../../../services/services/authentification.service"; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; import {AuthentificationResponse} from "../../../services/models/authentification-response"; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { authRequest: AuthentificationRequest = {email: '', motDePasse: ''}; errorMsg: Array = []; constructor(private authService: AuthentificationService, private router: Router) { } ngOnInit(): void { } // tslint:disable-next-line:typedef login() { this.errorMsg = []; this.authService.authenticate({ body: this.authRequest }).subscribe({ next: res => { // save this.router.navigate(['home']); }, error: err => { console.log(err); } }); } }
